content: if you fix the language compilation time it would be great because it takes a long time to compile just a little game if you fix it it would be good because everyone would like the language and very fast

Hello compilation team it would be good for you to fix the rust compilation time because to run a little game on the compiler and almost q 1 day it takes a long time if you fix this would be more quality

The performance of the compiler is tracked at https://perf.rust-lang.org and there is #t-compiler/performance which works on it.

As a side note, saying "if you fix it would be good" is extremely reductive: it's not as simple as flipping a switch, there are many things that impact compile times. Please assume positive intent.
